features: POWERFUL & PORTABLE: The 1600W heating element and compact size make the travel mini steamer easy to pack and take on the go.
EFFICIENT STEAMING: With a quick heat-up time of 25 seconds and continuous steam for up to 10 minutes, the steamer efficiently removes wrinkles.
VERSATILE TOOL: Use the portable steamers for clothes on upholstery, curtains, bedding, and more.
USER-FRIENDLY: The handheld steamer is easy to use with its one-touch power button, simple design, and detachable water tank. INCLUDES a Fabric brush, measuring cup, and travel bag.

SAFE & GENTLE: The travel mini steamer includes automatic shut-off, leak-proof design, and 360-degree spill-proof technology, making it safe to use on all fabrics. It comes with a fabric brush, measuring cup, travel bag.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: POWERFUL & EFFICIENT The 1600W heating element delivers powerful and efficient steaming performance, with a quick heat-up time of just 25 seconds. The Fabric steamer is perfect for removing even the toughest wrinkles from all types of fabrics. USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN Our handheld steamer for clothes is designed for ease of use, featuring a one-touch button power and simple design that requires no complicated instructions or settings. Additionally, the detachable water tank makes it easy to refill and use as needed. SLEEK & PORTABLE Eurolux portable clothes steamer features an elegant and modern design that is both sleek and portable, making a perfect for on-the-go use. The 1600W heating element delivers superior steaming performance, and was even the toughest wrinkles from all types of fabrics

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this steamer! Easy to use and works great!! Not sure it’s something to take when traveling because of the size and weight tho. There’s plenty of things to use it on at home tho so worth the expense. Comes in handy more than I thought.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well, a little heavy but a good steamer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice portable steamer. it is not too big and easy to use. If you don't have the time to iron, this is perfect for a quick, wrinkle free clothing. It is definitely great for traveling and for a quick steam. It has detachable heads so you can get the proper steam amount for different types of clothing. It is also easy to hold, which helps a lot in steaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not small or lightweight
reviews.reviewText: I did not buy this as a travel item, but I was not expecting the weight that came with the size of steamer. Without the 5 oz of water added it's got some weight to it. I don't see me doing lots of items hanging, because my arm will get tired for sure holding this for a period of time.Have not used it yet, so don't know about ease of use and the working mechanics of it. Will update later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great! Wouldn't really call it "Portable"
reviews.reviewText: I usually don't write reviews but since this steamer only has a couple reviews I was a little unsure whether it would actually be any good. Plus the price is fairly low compared to a lot of the other steamers out there. I've tried it out on several shirts and it works great! The attachments it comes with are nice. I personally wouldn't consider it "portable" as it is a bit bulky but since I don't really plan to travel with it anyways the size doesn't really bother me. Would definitely recommend it if you don't mind it being a little big.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Is best steamer ever
reviews.reviewText: I love this steamer it works so good. Better than an iron and more efficient and quickly done I highly recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not turning on anymore
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I only started using it and it just stopped turning on! Feels like it’s defective and getting too hot but not cooling down. Not sure what to do with this thing now.
